Class OrbitalMechanics

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.astronomy.mechanics.OrbitalMechanics
public class OrbitalMechanics extends Object
Orbital mechanics calculations.

Provides Kepler's laws, vis-viva equation, and orbital maneuvers. All methods use type-safe Quantity measurements.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    • solveLambert

      public static OrbitalMechanics.LambertResult solveLambert(double[] r1, double[] r2, double dt, double mu, boolean prograde)
      Solves Lambert's problem using Universal Variables method.
      Parameters:
      r1 - Position vector 1 [x, y, z] in meters
      r2 - Position vector 2 [x, y, z] in meters
      dt - Time of flight in seconds
      mu - Gravitational parameter (mÂ³/sÂ²)
      prograde - true for prograde (short way)
      Returns:
      LambertResult containing v1, v2 and convergence status
